commits.content:
Taibah Fried Chicken

{{ $order->code_tr }}

{{ $order->user->name }}
@if ($addresses = null) @foreach ($addresses as $address)
{{ $address->first_name }}, {{ $address->last_name }},
{{ $address->street_address }},
{{ $villages->where('code',$address->village)->value('name') }}, {{ $districts->where('code',$address->district)->value('name') }}, {{ $cities->where('code',$address->city)->value('name') }}, {{ $states->where('code',$address->state)->value('name') }},
{{ $address->zip_code }}
@endforeach @endif Status : @if ( $order->is_paid == 1) Paid @else Unpaid @endif - {{ $order->payment_method }}
{{ $order->status }} - {{ $order->sales_type }}

order items @foreach ($orderitems as $orderitem)
{{ $orderitem->product->name }} {{ $orderitem->product->variant }}
@currency($orderitem->unit_amount)x{{ $orderitem->quantity }} = @currency($orderitem->total_amount)
@endforeach

Sub@currency($order->grand_total + $order->discount - $order->shipping_amount)
Discount@currency($order->discount)
Shipping@currency($order->shipping_amount)
Total@currency($order->grand_total)
Bayar@currency($order->bayar)
@if ( $order->kembali < 0) Belum Bayar @else Kembali @endif @currency($order->bayar - $order->grand_total)

Thank you
